duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet/exceed revenue and profit margin targets (monthly, quarterly, and annual)
Develop and deliver accurate volume forecasts for assigned customers
Create opportunities through referrals, outbound prospecting, trade shows, and industry conferences
Develop strong customer relationships with multiple decision makers including executive level to facilitate stronger strategic growth opportunities
Conduct quarterly business reviews to ensure customer needs are met
Represent assigned customers for new product development and engineering services

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, engineering or related subject or equivalent related experience
